name: getfullnameparsedmatch
description: Gets a similarity key for matching purposes for parsed full name data, where the first name and last name are split into separate fields in the source data rather than combined.

license.description: Your Interzoid license API key. Register at www.interzoid.com/register

firstname.description: First name from which to generate similarity key

lastname.description: Last name from which to generate similarity key
